com.cloudpos.smartcardreader

Interface SmartCardReaderDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Device, TimeConstants

    public interface SmartCardReaderDevice
extends Device, TimeConstants
    The SmartCardReaderDevice interface defines the smart card APIs to be used by the applications.

    The smart card device object is obtained from the POSTerminal, its' as follows: 

     SmartCardReaderDevice martCardReaderDevice =
         (SmartCardReaderDevice) POSTerminal.getInstance().getDevice("cloudpos.device.smartcardreader");
    Among them, the "cloudpos.device.smartcardreader" string is to identify the smart card device, defined by the specific implementation.

    Uses the smart card device object to control the operation of the smart card device.

    An app can request permission to access the device, as shown below: 

     <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CLOUDPOS_SMARTCARD"/>
    See Also:
    Device

      • open

          throws DeviceException

        Parameters:

      • listenForCardPresent

        void listenForCardPresent(OperationListener listener,
                        int timeout)
                          throws DeviceException
        Listens until a card is inserted in this terminal. A callback will be called when the card is inserted or the card is present already.

        This is an asynchronous method. handleResult() will be invoked when at least one card has been detected in the field.

        Because this method uses a timeout parameter, the device receiving this request MUST be able to successfully respond to cancelRequest() and abort the operation.

        In case of a timeout occurring, the operation result will contain code= ERR_TIMEOUT, and no information about card will be available.

        Parameters:
        timeout - the maximum scanning time of the method, in milliseconds.
        listener - operation listener.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException
        See Also:
        OperationListener.handleResult(com.cloudpos.OperationResult)

      • waitForCardPresent

        SmartCardReaderOperationResult waitForCardPresent(int timeout)
                                                  throws DeviceException
        This is the synchronous method of the listenForCardPresent(OperationListener,int).
        Parameters:
        timeout - the maximum scanning time of the method, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the Targets of scanning. null if scanning timeout.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException

      • listenForCardAbsent

        void listenForCardAbsent(OperationListener listener,
                       int timeout)
                         throws DeviceException
        Listens until a card is removed from this terminal. A callback will be called when the card is removed or the card is absent already.

        This is an asynchronous method.

        Because this method uses a timeout parameter, the device receiving this request MUST be able to successfully respond to cancelRequest() and abort the operation.

        In case of a timeout occurring, the operation result will contain code= ERR_TIMEOUT, and no information about card will be available.

        Parameters:
        listener - operation listener.
        timeout - the maximum wait time of the method, in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException

      • waitForCardAbsent

        SmartCardReaderOperationResult waitForCardAbsent(int timeout)
                                                 throws DeviceException
        This is the synchronous method of the listenForCardAbsent(OperationListener,int).
        Parameters:
        timeout - the maximum wait time of the method, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        RFCardReaderOperationResult
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException
